title: Metro
creator_credit: Thomas Carter, Randy Fedlman, Ray Murray Jr and Touchstone Pictures
brief_description: Eddie Murphy utilises his manic comic skills as a hostage negotiator working for the San Francisco Police Department. His cool-under-fire demeanour is tested when his girlfriend is taken hostage by a man who was also responsible for the death of a friend and colleague. Starring Eddie Murphy, Michael Rapaport, and Michael Wincott.
